products.title: Colourtex Azure
products.description: Colourtex azure made to measure roller blind.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Baby Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: Our new baby blue fabric is already proving to be one of the most popular additions to the trinity blackout collection, and with good reason. It offers a subtle texture that sits gently in the background, adding something that will be appreciated no matter which room you choose to use it in. The wonderful thing about baby blue is that you can use it to set the tone for any number of different creative avenues.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Denim - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity blackout in denim is so much more than a fabric that allows you to get the perfect restful sleep mind and body need. It's a contemporary shade whose texture really brings the colour to life, and allows you to do something a little bit special. We love the idea of hanging denim in the kitchen so that you can turn on the style when it's time to cook up a feast. If you have the option to match it to the tiling then even better, but don't feel like you have to constrain yourself when the time comes to make a change.

products.title: Unilux Pvc Blackout Topaz Blue Roller Blind
products.description: A stunning jewelled blue shade. Give your bathroom or kitchen a modern makeover with the unilux pvc blackout roller blind. This roller blind is made from moisture resistant pvc and is guaranteed to give your space a fresh feel thanks to its contemporary design and crisp white finish. In addition, the blackout material will provide the required peace and privacy. products.title: Konya Blackout Ink Blue
products.description: Konya blackoutink blue plain roller blind the konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester, with a pvc blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. products.title: Roma, Aqua Haze - Roller Blind
products.description: The sweet duck egg of roma's aqua haze makes for a lovely accent to any window. The colour really comes into its own when set against the outside sunlight, and it provides privacy without blocking the light out altogether. For some country chic, pair with pretty floral curtains in your dining room or place against white walls and pine units in a kitchen to truly brighten things up. The pale colour also makes this the ideal blind for small utility rooms or bathrooms that don't get a lot of natural light.

products.title: Fortune, Teal - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma in fortune green is a subtle, blue-teal shade with a wonderfully oceanic look to it. Typical of roma fabric, the material is supple yet strong, making for a high quality blind that lasts. Opt for a lovely seaside theme in your bedroom by matching the fortune green to shabby chic accessories, bleached woods, and similar blues and greens. Go one step further and add seashells and coastal pictures too.

products.title: Palate Rich Teal Roller Blind
products.description: The palate blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Boheme Pvc Blackout Azure Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Add a smart, contemporary finish to your chosen room with this appealing modern pattern. Featuring eye-catching curvaceous abstract leaves with a subtle white outline on a rich azure blue background, boheme pvc blackout azure blue double-sided blind is bound to gain many compliments. Flame retardant, this roller blind is made out of a blackout fabric, so it wont let light escape into your room, especially on a bright morning.

products.title: Amor Baby Blue Roller Blind
products.description: The light turquoise blue colour of the amor baby blue is as close to the famous colour as we can get. This is perfect for anyone wanting to add a touch of class to a room. This blind makes a great statement piece or as a match to similarly coloured furniture. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Dark Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: Pair practicality with style with the roma (fr) in dark blue, where a flame-retardant fabric, ideal for commercial buildings, forms a substantial and contemporary blind with an easy pull-cord mechanism. This distinct blend of fibers creates a crease-free blind with a neat and modern look, and in a gorgeous midnight shade. Match the vibrant and bold dark blue with a complementing and current palette of dove greys, white, and charcoal to form a stylish and modern theme.

products.title: Tiffany, Gentle - Roller Blind
products.description: A clever combination of a light cream, gently curved patterning, set on a deeper cream fine fabric background, the tiffany gentle has a pleasing homely feel and will sit subtly amidst almost any colour scheme. The tiffany gentle is a very versatile blind, and is particularly suited to more traditional dcor styles. It can provide a wonderful lightening effect in living rooms or dining rooms where darker woods and furniture might take over, or can provide a touch of modern patterning to a neutral hallway or conservatory without dominating your existing style.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Bluebell - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) bluebell couldn't be closer in shade to that of the pretty wildflower itself. This pretty yet simple blind is made from durable, wipe-clean fabric, and has all of the features of its sister blackout blinds. Use in the kitchen amidst cream walls and delicate florals for a spring-like feel and all of the cheer that comes with it, or add it to lilacs and pinks in a child's room, using it to lift out the colours in coordinating patterns.

products.title: Tiffany, Flawless - Roller Blind
products.description: The tiffany flawless is an elegant and refined blind. A light, breezy fabric layered with a natural contoured pattern, the flawless looks simply stunning as it delicately shimmers in the light. Use the timeless off-white of the flawless to accentuate darker neutrals in a home office or dining room, or pair with pretty peaches and medium woods to add a touch of sophistication and class to an open kitchen diner.
